mapper.insert: insert into T_document(documentId, title, departId, doc_uuid,levelId, userId) VALUES(documentId,#{title},#{departId},#{doc_uuid},#{levelId},#{userId})
mapper.select: select * from T_document doc join T_User u on doc.userId=u.userId join T_depart d on doc.departId=d.departid where levelId in (${str})
